A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
VFX were great\, sound was great\, practicle effects were great.
Floating force Leia was aweful.
The amount of comedy ruined the tone.
The entire casino/hacker subplot was terrible.
Snoke meant nothing.
Rei's parents were a red herring.
Luke doesn't act like Luke.
plot holes plot holes plot holes.
Luke dies for noi reason\, snoke dies for no reason\, Rei is the most powerful force weilder for no reason\, Phasma dies for no reason.
There was just so much wrong with this movie. The only things I enjoyed were the vfx\, sound\, and effects.
